content: meet the ribbed wonder a fun and quick crochet project includes instructions for an easy crochet hat pattern > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed - chunky weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size l/11 8mm - tapestry needle for weaving in ends sized for an adult but easy to adjust to other sizes guidelines given pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/ribbed-wonder-easy-crochet-hat/
